title: Ron Barassi's top 31 players
brief_description: Football legend Ron Barassi selects his top 31 players from the past 31 years of Australian Rules Football. His selections (in random order) are: Michael Tuck, Leigh Matthews, Robert Flower, Gerard Healy, John Nicholls, Ted Whitten, Kevin Bartlett, Paul Roos, Doug Wade, Simon Madden, Peter Daicos, Malcolm Blight, Roger Hart, John Rantall, Keith Greig, Francis Bourke, Tony Lockett, Stephen Kernahan, Geoff Southby, Ian Stewart, Darrel Baldeck, Alex Jesaulenko, Bob Skilton, Gary Ablett, Greg Williams, Wayne Schimmelbusch, Kevin Murray, Barry Cable, Bruce Doull, Graham Farmer, Peter Hudson. Features fantastic footage of some of the legends of the game performing at the height of their careers.
